languages.text: "В сердце моем родилось высокомерие, что попрало зов долга. Забыв заветы Императора, столь же строгие, сколь и милостивые, я несла смерть и одну лишь смерть. Я не служила Империуму Человечества, а строила убогую пародию на Его творение".

traits.locale_text: "В сердце моем родилось высокомерие, что попрало зов долга. Забыв заветы Императора, столь же строгие, сколь и милостивые, я несла смерть и одну лишь смерть. Я не служила Империуму Человечества, а строила убогую пародию на Его творение".
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Arrogance was born in my heart, and it trampled over my sense of duty. I forgot the Emperor's commandments, which are as strict as they are merciful, and became a bringer of death and death only. I was not serving the Imperium of Humanity. I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."
languages.original_text: "В сердце моем родилось высокомерие, что попрало зов долга. Забыв заветы Императора, столь же строгие, сколь и милостивые, я несла смерть и одну лишь смерть. Я не служила Империуму Человечества, а строила убогую пародию на Его творение".

I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “我任由傲慢在我心中生根，任由它践踏了我的责任感。我忘记了帝皇既严格又仁慈的戒律，我沦为了一个只会带来死亡的人。我没能为人类帝国效力，我仅仅是在拙劣地模仿祂的律法罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Arrogance was born in my heart, and it trampled over my sense of duty. I forgot the Emperor's commandments, which are as strict as they are merciful, and became a bringer of death and death only. I was not serving the Imperium of Humanity. I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."

traits.locale_text: “我任由傲慢在我心中生根，任由它践踏了我的责任感。我忘记了帝皇既严格又仁慈的戒律，我沦为了一个只会带来死亡的人。我没能为人类帝国效力，我仅仅是在拙劣地模仿祂的律法罢了。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「私の心には傲慢が生まれ、義務感を踏みにじった。慈悲深くも厳しい皇帝の指揮を忘れ、死のみをもたらす者となった。私はもはや、人類の帝国に仕えてはいなかった。私は皇帝が創造した物の、惨めな茶番劇を生み出していただけだった」
languages.original_text: "Arrogance was born in my heart, and it trampled over my sense of duty. I forgot the Emperor's commandments, which are as strict as they are merciful, and became a bringer of death and death only. I was not serving the Imperium of Humanity. I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."

traits.locale_text: 「私の心には傲慢が生まれ、義務感を踏みにじった。慈悲深くも厳しい皇帝の指揮を忘れ、死のみをもたらす者となった。私はもはや、人類の帝国に仕えてはいなかった。私は皇帝が創造した物の、惨めな茶番劇を生み出していただけだった」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «La arrogancia se abrió paso en mi corazón y pisoteó mi sentido del deber. Olvidé los mandamientos del Emperador, tan estrictos como misericordiosos, y me convertí en portadora de la muerte. No servía al Imperium de la Humanidad. Estaba construyendo una parodia a Su creación».
languages.original_text: "Arrogance was born in my heart, and it trampled over my sense of duty. I forgot the Emperor's commandments, which are as strict as they are merciful, and became a bringer of death and death only. I was not serving the Imperium of Humanity. I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."

traits.locale_text: «La arrogancia se abrió paso en mi corazón y pisoteó mi sentido del deber. Olvidé los mandamientos del Emperador, tan estrictos como misericordiosos, y me convertí en portadora de la muerte. No servía al Imperium de la Humanidad. Estaba construyendo una parodia a Su creación».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Hochmut wurde in meinem Herzen geboren, und er hat mein Pflichtgefühl zertrampelt. Ich habe die Gebote des Imperators vergessen, die so strikt wie gnädig sind, und bin Bringerin von Tod und nichts als Tod geworden. Ich habe nicht länger dem Imperium der Menschheit gedient. Ich habe eine erbärmliche Parodie seiner Schöpfung erschaffen."
languages.original_text: "Arrogance was born in my heart, and it trampled over my sense of duty. I forgot the Emperor's commandments, which are as strict as they are merciful, and became a bringer of death and death only. I was not serving the Imperium of Humanity. I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."

traits.locale_text: "Hochmut wurde in meinem Herzen geboren, und er hat mein Pflichtgefühl zertrampelt. Ich habe die Gebote des Imperators vergessen, die so strikt wie gnädig sind, und bin Bringerin von Tod und nichts als Tod geworden. Ich habe nicht länger dem Imperium der Menschheit gedient. Ich habe eine erbärmliche Parodie seiner Schöpfung erschaffen."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « L'arrogance s'est emparée de mon cœur, piétinant mon sens du devoir. J'en ai oublié les commandements de l'Empereur, qui sont aussi stricts que miséricordieux, à tel point que je ne savais plus que donner la mort. Au lieu d'agir pour le bien de l'Imperium de l'humanité, je bâtissais une caricature pitoyable de Sa création. »
languages.original_text: "Arrogance was born in my heart, and it trampled over my sense of duty. I forgot the Emperor's commandments, which are as strict as they are merciful, and became a bringer of death and death only. I was not serving the Imperium of Humanity. I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."

traits.locale_text: « L'arrogance s'est emparée de mon cœur, piétinant mon sens du devoir. J'en ai oublié les commandements de l'Empereur, qui sont aussi stricts que miséricordieux, à tel point que je ne savais plus que donner la mort. Au lieu d'agir pour le bien de l'Imperium de l'humanité, je bâtissais une caricature pitoyable de Sa création. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Kalbimin içinden kibir doğdu ve görev bilincimi ezdi geçti. İmparator'un katı olduğu kadar merhametli de olan emirlerini unuttum ve yalnızca ölüm saçan biri oldum. İnsanlığın İmparatorluğu'na hizmet etmiyordum. O'nun yaratımının içler acısı bir parodisini inşa ediyordum."
languages.original_text: "Arrogance was born in my heart, and it trampled over my sense of duty. I forgot the Emperor's commandments, which are as strict as they are merciful, and became a bringer of death and death only. I was not serving the Imperium of Humanity. I was building a pitiful parody of His creation."

traits.locale_text: "Kalbimin içinden kibir doğdu ve görev bilincimi ezdi geçti. İmparator'un katı olduğu kadar merhametli de olan emirlerini unuttum ve ölüm ve yalnızca ölüm saçan biri hâline geldim. İnsanlığın İmparatorluk'una hizmet etmiyordum. O'nun yaratımının içler acısı bir parodisini inşa ediyordum."
traits.speaker: Chorda
